hero.headline: Third-Generation Excellence in
hero.subheadline: Trusted across India since 1996. We bring 28+ years of grain trading expertise to international markets with competitive pricing, quality assurance, and reliable logistics.
hero.backgroundAlt: Premium quality Indian grains and pulses ready for export

features.title: Direct Procurement
features.description: Strategic relationships with farmers and millers across Punjab, Haryana, MP, and Maharashtra. Direct-from-source procurement ensures most competitive pricing and timely market intelligence sharing with our clients.

features.title: Quality Systems
features.description: State-of-the-art processing with sortex cleaning and moisture control. NABL lab testing on every batch. Optional SGS/Bureau Veritas pre-shipment inspection. Stored in sanitary, temperature-controlled warehousing facilities.

features.title: Export & Logistics
features.description: Complete documentation support: Phytosanitary, Certificate of Origin, Fumigation certificates. Partnerships with certified packers and logistics providers. Pre-shipment drop testing on all supply sacks. LC/DP/Advance payment terms.

services.headline: Premium Indian Grains & Pulses
services.subheadline: Supplying the finest quality products at competitive prices. With direct sourcing from farmers and millers across India's prime agricultural zones, we deliver export-grade commodities with complete transparency and traceability.

items.title: 1121 Basmati Rice
items.description: World's finest aromatic long-grain rice. Premium Sella (8.35mm), Golden Sella (8.30mm), and Steam (8.35mm) variants. <2% broken premium grade. Sourced directly from Punjab and Haryana mills with complete quality certification.

items.title: Non-Basmati Rice
items.description: IR-64, Sona Masoori, and Parboiled varieties. Double polished to perfection, 5% broken standard grade. High-volume export specialist for institutional buyers, food processors, and wholesale distributors. Most aggressive FOB/CIF pricing.

items.title: Kabuli Chickpeas
items.description: Premium bold grade: 8mm, 9mm, 10mm sizes. 99%+ purity guaranteed, <12% moisture content. Machine cleaned, sortex processed, and pre-shipment drop tested. High nutritional value meeting international food safety standards.

items.title: Premium Pulses & Lentils
items.description: Comprehensive range: Masoor Dal (Red Lentils - Football/Split), Toor Dal (Pigeon Peas), Moong Dal (Green Gram), Chana Dal (Bengal Gram). 99.5%+ purity with complete farm-to-port traceability. Stored in sanitary, temperature-controlled facilities.

items.title: Wheat & Flour
items.description: Whole wheat grains and processed atta (wheat flour). Premium MP and Punjab varieties. Custom milling specifications available for bulk orders. Ideal for bakeries, food manufacturers, and wholesale distribution.

items.title: Specialty Crops
items.description: High-demand specialty crops including Yellow Peas, Sesame Seeds, and other pulses. Catering to health-conscious markets in Middle East and Africa with superior nutritional profiles and strict quality grading.

callToAction.title: Ready to Import Quality?
callToAction.description: Join our diverse global clientele. Get FOB/CIF quotations with transparent pricing, request pre-shipment samples, or establish long-term supply partnerships backed by three generations of grain trading excellence.

testimonials.headline: Trusted by wholesalers and importers
testimonials.subheadline: Building partnerships rooted in quality, transparency, and timely delivery

items.quote: Shree Uma Nath Enterprises has been our reliable partner for Basmati exports for over 5 years. Their quality consistency and documentation support make international trade seamless.
items.author: Ahmed Al-Mansouri

items.quote: We've sourced multiple containers of Kabuli chickpeas and the quality has been exceptional every time. Their competitive pricing and flexible payment terms are unmatched.
items.author: Rajesh Kumar

items.quote: From sample dispatch to final delivery, the entire process was professional. The APEDA certification and SGS inspection reports gave us complete confidence in the product quality.
items.author: Mohammed Khalid

process.headline: Our Export Process
process.subheadline: Seamless journey from farm to your warehouse

steps.title: Procurement
steps.description: Direct sourcing from trusted farmers and millers across India's prime agricultural zones

steps.title: Quality Testing
steps.description: NABL lab testing, sortex cleaning, and moisture control for every batch

steps.title: Processing & Packing
steps.description: State-of-the-art processing with food-grade packaging as per international standards

steps.title: Export & Delivery
steps.description: Complete documentation, fumigation, and timely shipping to your destination

quality.headline: World-Class Quality Standards
quality.description: Every shipment undergoes rigorous quality checks and meets international food safety standards.

points.title: Certified Labs
points.description: NABL-accredited laboratory testing for every shipment

points.title: Traceability
points.description: Complete batch tracking from farm to port

cta.headline: Ready to Start Your Export Journey?
cta.description: Let's discuss your requirements and create a customized export solution for your business.

privateLabeling.headline: PRIVATE LABELING
privateLabeling.subheadline: Build Your Own Rice Brand with Us
privateLabeling.description: Elevate your brand with our unrivalled expertise and passion for excellence! Our rich legacy is rooted in our unwavering commitment to turning your brand dreams into reality.

steps.title: Select Grade & Variety
steps.description: Choose from our premium range of Basmati and Non-Basmati rice varieties. We offer 1121 Basmati, Golden Sella, Steam, IR-64, Sona Masoori and more. Expert guidance to match your market requirements.

steps.title: Custom Packaging Design
steps.description: Create distinctive packaging that reflects your brand identity. Our design team works with you to develop eye-catching labels, bags, and packaging materials that meet international standards and stand out on shelves.

steps.title: Regulatory Compliance of Your Country
steps.description: We ensure your product meets all regulatory requirements for your target market. Complete documentation support including nutritional labeling, food safety certificates, and country-specific compliance.

steps.title: Logistics & Global Shipping to Your Port
steps.description: Seamless delivery to your destination port with complete tracking. We handle container booking, customs clearance, and all shipping documentation to ensure timely arrival of your branded products.
